title: Polymetallic doping of Mn-based perovskite oxides for chemical looping dry reforming of methane
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01161A, Paper
Yihong Zhu, Juping Zhang, Dongfang Li, Tao Zhu, Xing Zhu
We fabricated a highly active oxygen carrier using functionally designed Mn-based perovskite oxides via Cu and Ni doping in B-sites and Ce doping in A-site for anti-coking, methane activation and the enhancement of oxygen mobility.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
